sentences.sentence: Such enormities would not be tolerated today.
What then! Such enormities were to happen and no one was to be punished!
sentences.translation: 怎么？难道发生了如此荒谬绝伦的事后竟无人受到惩罚！

sentences.sentence: But while the book does an excellent job of recounting the Madoff story, it is all trees and no forest, focusing repeatedly on details while skipping over enormities.
sentences.translation: 虽然该书对麦道夫的经历做了出色的重叙，却反复聚焦于细节而略过了那些罪行，实在是只见树木而看不到整个森林。
